General.Name: Yiwu Huading Nylon Co Ltd
General.Description: Yiwu Huading Nylon Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of nylon filaments primarily in China. The company offers nylon 6 POY, HOY, FDY, ACY, ATY, and DTY products. Its products are used for ports and leisure clothing, swimwear, down jackets, seamless underwear, lace, suits, shirts, T-shirts, fashion fabrics, and high-end socks. The company also exports its products to South America, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and other countries and regions. Yiwu Huading Nylon Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Yiwu, China.
General.Address: 3rd-period Project of Beiyuan Ind. Park, Yiwu, China, 322000
